<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file Pass to config the shape of AMX physical registers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// AMX register need to be configured before use. In X86PreTileConfig pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the pldtilecfg instruction is inserted, however at that time we don&#39;t</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// know the shape of each physical tile registers, because the register</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// allocation is not done yet. This pass runs after egister allocation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pass. It collects the shape information of each physical tile register</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and store the shape in the stack slot that is allocated for load config</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to tile config register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here is the data format for the tile config.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0      palette</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1      start&#95;row</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 16-17  tile0.colsb Tile 0 bytes per row.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 18-19  tile1.colsb Tile 1 bytes per row.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ... (sequence continues)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 30-31  tile7.colsb Tile 7 bytes per row.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 32-47  reserved, must be zero</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 48     tile0.rows Tile 0 rows.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
